author: Simon Difford
description: The use of a dry, or at least not so sweet, espresso-style coffee liqueur is essential to the flavour and balance of this rum-laced nutty coffee shot.
name: Buona Sera Shot
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
